Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Village Urban Resort Coventry in Coventry, you'll be in the business district and convenient to West Orchards Shopping and Coventry University. This spa hotel is within close proximity of Lady Godiva Statue and University of Warwick.

Rooms
Stay in one of 146 guestrooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with shower/tub combinations feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find a health club, an indoor pool, and a spa tub. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, wedding services, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 3 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. English breakfasts are available for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

West Orchards Shopping - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Lady Godiva Statue - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
University of Warwick - 2.6 km / 1.6 mi
Coventry Transport Museum - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Coventry Cathedral - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Coventry University - 2.9 km / 1.8 mi
Ricoh Arena - 6.2 km / 3.8 mi
Kenilworth Castle - 6.7 km / 4.2 mi
Stoneleigh Abbey - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi
Coombe Abbey Country Park - 9.6 km / 5.9 mi
Temple Balsall - 10.4 km / 6.5 mi
Arbury Hall - 11.2 km / 7 mi
National Motorcycle Museum - 11.8 km / 7.3 mi
National Exhibition Centre - 12.5 km / 7.7 mi
LG Arena - 12.7 km / 7.9 mi

The nearest airports are:
Coventry (CVT) - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Birmingham (BHX) - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi

The preferred airport for Village Urban Resort Coventry is Birmingham (BHX).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
